VPX Unit.description: Viewport pixel unit (converts to vw based on viewport width)

MaxVPX Unit.description: Viewport pixel with minimum bound (converts to max(vw, Npx))

MinVPX Unit.description: Viewport pixel with maximum bound (converts to min(vw, Npx))

CVPX Unit.description: Clamped viewport pixel (converts to clamp(minPx, vw, maxPx))

Linear VPX - Short Form.description: Linear interpolation using default viewport range from config

Linear VPX - Full Form.description: Linear interpolation with custom viewport range
